roleset.name: to discolor, soil, spot; treat a specimen with a reagent or dye in order to enhance contrast in the microscopic image
roleset.note: STAIN-V NOTES: Frames file for 'stain' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from stain.01-v predicate notes) Roleset name and examples extended for Bio AMRs by Bianca and Ulf.

example.name: transitive
example.text: It even directed newspapers not to publish anything that [*T*-1] might stain the honor of the Turkish sultan 's wives .
example.arg: the honor of the Turkish sultan 's wives

example.name: metaphorical
example.text: This was especially true given who the occupant of the White House was and his staining of the highest office in the land.
example.arg: of the highest office in the land

example.name: all ARGs
example.text: After the cocultivation, we stained the sample with propidium iodide (PI) to assess the percentage of dead target cells.
